transcript.title: 2005 Council of Australian Governments' Meeting
transcript.content:
I have written to Premiers, Chief Ministers and the President of the Australian Local Government Association informing them of my intention to hold the next meeting of the Council of Australian Governments (COAG) on Friday, 3 June 2005 in Canberra.

The meeting will provide the opportunity for constructive Commonwealth-state dialogue on a range of key reform issues of economic and social importance to Australia's future.
